channel.title: CVE Feed for Kaspersky Lab -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Kaspersky Lab -- all products

item.title: CVE-2018-15351|2024-08-05T09:54:01.983Z -- kaspersky%20lab -- kraftway
item.description: Denial of service via crafting malicious link and sending it to a privileged user can cause Denial of Service in Kraftway 24F2XG Router firmware version 3.5.30.1118.

item.title: CVE-2018-15360|2024-08-05T09:54:03.404Z -- kaspersky%20lab -- eltex%20esp-200
item.description: An attacker without authentication can login with default credentials for privileged users in Eltex ESP-200 firmware version 1.2.0.

item.title: CVE-2018-15354|2024-08-05T09:54:03.595Z -- kaspersky%20lab -- kraftway
item.description: A Buffer Overflow exploited through web interface by remote attacker can cause denial of service in Kraftway 24F2XG Router firmware 3.5.30.1118.

item.title: CVE-2018-15124|2024-08-05T09:46:25.560Z -- kaspersky%20lab -- zipato%20zipabox%20smart%20home%20controller
item.description: Weak hashing algorithm in Zipato Zipabox Smart Home Controller BOARD REV - 1 with System Version -118 allows unauthenticated attacker extract clear text passwords and get root access on the device.

item.title: CVE-2018-15355|2024-08-05T09:54:01.937Z -- kaspersky%20lab -- kraftway
item.description: Usage of SSLv2 and SSLv3 leads to transmitted data decryption in Kraftway 24F2XG Router firmware 3.5.30.1118.

item.title: CVE-2018-15356|2024-08-05T09:54:02.435Z -- kaspersky%20lab -- eltex%20esp-200
item.description: An authenticated attacker can execute arbitrary code using command ejection in Eltex ESP-200 firmware version 1.2.0.

item.title: CVE-2018-15123|2024-08-05T09:46:25.331Z -- kaspersky%20lab -- zipato%20zipabox%20smart%20home%20controller
item.description: Insecure configuration storage in Zipato Zipabox Smart Home Controller BOARD REV - 1 with System Version -118 allows remote attacker perform new attack vectors and take under control device and smart home.

item.title: CVE-2018-20026|2024-08-05T11:51:18.313Z -- kaspersky%20lab -- codesys%20v3%20products
item.description: Improper Communication Address Filtering exists in CODESYS V3 products versions prior V3.5.14.0.

item.title: CVE-2018-15352|2024-08-05T09:54:01.844Z -- kaspersky%20lab -- kraftway
item.description: An attacker with low privileges can cause denial of service in Kraftway 24F2XG Router firmware version 3.5.30.1118.

item.title: CVE-2017-12816|2024-08-05T18:51:06.794Z -- kaspersky%20lab -- kaspersky%20lab%20kaspersky%20internet%20security%20for%20android%2011.12.4.1622
item.description: In Kaspersky Internet Security for Android 11.12.4.1622, some of application exports activities have weak permissions, which might be used by a malware application to get unauthorized access to the product functionality by using Android IPC.

item.title: CVE-2017-12817|2024-08-05T18:51:06.654Z -- kaspersky%20lab -- kaspersky%20lab%20kaspersky%20internet%20security%20for%20android%2011.12.4.1622
item.description: In Kaspersky Internet Security for Android 11.12.4.1622, some of the application trace files were not encrypted.

item.title: CVE-2018-15357|2024-08-05T09:54:01.805Z -- kaspersky%20lab -- eltex%20esp-200
item.description: An authenticated attacker with low privileges can extract password hash information for all users in Eltex ESP-200 firmware version 1.2.0.

item.title: CVE-2018-15125|2024-08-05T09:46:25.296Z -- kaspersky%20lab -- zipato%20zipabox%20smart%20home%20controller
item.description: Sensitive Information Disclosure in Zipato Zipabox Smart Home Controller allows remote attacker get sensitive information that expands attack surface.

item.title: CVE-2018-15353|2024-08-05T09:54:03.362Z -- kaspersky%20lab -- kraftway
item.description: A Buffer Overflow exploited through web interface by remote attacker can cause remote code execution in Kraftway 24F2XG Router firmware 3.5.30.1118.

item.title: CVE-2018-15359|2024-08-05T09:54:03.461Z -- kaspersky%20lab -- eltex%20esp-200
item.description: An authenticated attacker with low privileges can use insecure sudo configuration to expand attack surface in Eltex ESP-200 firmware version 1.2.0.

item.title: CVE-2018-15350|2024-08-05T09:54:03.564Z -- kaspersky%20lab -- kraftway
item.description: Router Default Credentials in Kraftway 24F2XG Router firmware version 3.5.30.1118 allow remote attackers to get privileged access to the router.

item.title: CVE-2018-6306|2024-08-05T06:01:48.695Z -- kaspersky%20lab -- kaspersky%20password%20manager
item.description: Unauthorized code execution from specific DLL and is known as DLL Hijacking attack in Kaspersky Password Manager versions before 8.0.6.538.

item.title: CVE-2018-20025|2024-08-05T11:51:18.307Z -- kaspersky%20lab -- codesys%20v3%20products
item.description: Use of Insufficiently Random Values exists in CODESYS V3 products versions prior V3.5.14.0.

item.title: CVE-2018-15358|2024-08-05T09:54:01.992Z -- kaspersky%20lab -- eltex%20esp-200
item.description: An authenticated attacker with low privileges can activate high privileged user and use it to expand attack surface in Eltex ESP-200 firmware version 1.2.0.
